title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat the eggs with the cheese and season with salt and pepper.
Toss the spaghetti with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture until creamy.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill the chicken until charred and cooked through.
Prepare the sauce with coconut milk, simmering until thickened.
Add the chicken to the sauce and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
